author: Albert Einstein
quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Isaac Newton
quote: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.

author: Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood.

author: Mark Twain
quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

author: Aristotle
quote: The more you know, the more you realize you don't know.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.

author: Socrates
quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.

author: Carl Sagan
quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

author: Nikola Tesla
quote: The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked, is mine.

author: Ada Lovelace
quote: That brain of mine is something more than merely mortal; as time goes on, I feel that I am more and more a part of the future.

author: Richard Feynman
quote: If you can’t explain something to a first-year student, then you haven’t really understood it.

author: Charles Darwin
quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.

author: Rosalind Franklin
quote: Science and everyday life cannot and should not be separated.

author: Katherine Johnson
quote: We will always have challenges to face, but as long as we keep pushing forward, we can overcome them.

author: Marie Curie
quote: I am one of those who think like Nobel, that humanity will draw more good than evil from new discoveries.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world.

author: Alan Turing
quote: We may hope that machines will eventually compete with men in all purely intellectual fields.

author: Thomas Edison
quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
